Text: I searched through many garbage .torrents to find this one. Wide screen, truly uncut, French dialogue, ENGLISH EMBEDDED SUBS. Thank you uploader. You are the one person who got it right.
Thank you, I saw the opening scene to this movie (in French) and had to find subtitles. One of the best horror flicks i've ever seen.

Thank you so much! My girl and I are watching scary movies all week leading up to Halloween, and she has never seen this. Thanks to you I can show her the film as it was meant  be seen, appreciate it.
Thanks vivatpb5776, you saved me a lot of time with your comment.
